mapper.select: /*거래상세*/ SELECT D.DEAL_SQ AS dealSq, /*거래순번*/ A.WORK_SQ AS workSq, /*작품번호*/ A.MBR_SQ AS mbrSq, /*멤버번호*/ A.ARTST_SQ AS artstSq, /*작가번호*/ D.SELL_MBR_SQ AS sellMbrSq, /*판매자 순번*/ A.ARTST_ACTVTY_NM AS artstActvtyNm, /*작가활동명*/ A.ARTST_ENGLS_NM AS artstEnglsNm, /*작가영문명*/ (SELECT SUB.MBR_NCKNM FROM TBL_DA_MBR_M SUB WHERE SUB.MBR_SQ = A.MBR_SQ) AS mbrNcknm, /*작가 닉네임*/ A.ARTST_BIRTH_YEAR AS artstBirthYear, /*작가생년월일*/ C.ARTST_PROFILE_IMG_URL AS artstProfileImgUrl, /*작가프로필사진주소*/ D.DEAL_TYP_CD AS dealTypCd, /*거래유형*/ D.DEAL_STTS_CD AS dealSttsCd, /*거래상태*/ A.WORK_NM AS workNm, /*작품명*/ A.WORK_PRODC_YEAR AS workProdcYear, /*작품제작년도*/ IF(A.WORK_MAIN_IMG_URL IS NULL, A.WORK_IMG_FRT_URL, A.WORK_MAIN_IMG_URL) AS workMainImgUrl, /*작품대표이미지주소*/ A.WORK_IMG_FRT_URL AS workImgFrtUrl, /*전면이미지주소*/ A.WORK_IMG_RER_URL AS workImgRerUrl, /*후면이미지주소*/ A.WORK_IMG_TOP_URL AS workImgTopUrl, /*상 이미지주소*/ A.WORK_IMG_BOT_URL AS workImgBotUrl, /*히 이미지주소*/ A.WORK_IMG_LEF_URL AS workImgLefUrl, /*좌 이미지주소*/ A.WORK_IMG_RIT_URL AS workImgRitUrl, /*우 이미지주소*/ A.WORK_SIZE_WIDTH AS workSizeWidth, /*작품사이즈가로*/ A.WORK_SIZE_DEPTH AS workSizeDepth, /*작품사이즈세로*/ A.WORK_LAKE AS workLake, /*작품 호수*/ A.WORK_CLR_CD AS workClrCd, /*작품 메인 컬러*/ A.WORK_PRODC_YEAR AS workProdcYear, /*작품제작년도*/ A.WORK_MATRL AS workMatrl, /*작품소재*/ A.WORK_GRT_URL AS workGrtUrl, /*작품보증서URL*/ A.WORK_FRM_YN AS workFrmYn, /*작품액자유무*/ D.MBR_REF_NO AS mbrRefNo, /*거래주문코드*/ (SELECT FORMAT(MAX(BID_PRC), 0) FROM TBL_DA_AUCTN_BID_H WHERE D.DEAL_SQ = DEAL_SQ) AS maxBidPrc, /*응찰가*/ FORMAT(D.DEAL_STRT_PRC, 0) AS dealStrtPrc, /*거래시작가격*/ FORMAT(D.DEAL_SBID_PRC, 0) AS dealSbidPrc, /*거래낙찰가격*/ (SELECT COUNT(DEAL_SQ) FROM TBL_DA_AUCTN_BID_H WHERE D.DEAL_SQ = DEAL_SQ) AS bidCnt, /*응찰수*/ (SELECT MBR_SQ FROM TBL_DA_AUCTN_BID_H WHERE D.DEAL_SQ = DEAL_SQ ORDER BY BID_PRC DESC LIMIT 1) AS bidMbrSq, /*마지막 응찰 회원 순번*/ DATE_FORMAT(D.DEAL_STRT_DT, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') AS dealStrtDate, /*거래시작날짜*/ DATE_FORMAT(D.DEAL_ENDNG_DT, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') AS dealEndngDate, /*거래종료날짜*/ D.DEAL_ENDNG_DT AS dealEndngDateTime, /*거래종료날짜시간*/ A.WORK_STATE AS workState FROM TBL_DA_WORK_M AS A LEFT JOIN TBL_DA_ARTST_M AS C ON A.ARTST_SQ = C.ARTST_SQ INNER JOIN TBL_DA_DEAL_M AS D ON A.WORK_SQ = D.WORK_SQ WHERE D.DEAL_SQ = #{dealSq} AND D.DEAL_STTS_CD != 'FB' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' /*작품 삭제 여부 확인 */
mapper.update: /*거래 등록 주문번호 등록*/ UPDATE TBL_DA_DEAL_M SET MBR_REF_NO = CONCAT('D', LPAD(DEAL_SQ, 17, '0')) WHERE DEAL_SQ = LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.select: /* 거래 등록 전 중복체크 */ SELECT COUNT(WORK_SQ) FROM TBL_DA_DEAL_M WHERE WORK_SQ = #{workSq} AND DEAL_STTS_CD NOT IN ('FB', 'ST')
/* 등록된 작품 개수 카운트 */ SELECT COUNT(SELL_MBR_SQ) FROM TBL_DA_DEAL_M WHERE SELL_MBR_SQ = #{mbrSq} AND DEAL_STTS_CD = 'TP'
/*화면에 입력된 응찰가와 실시간 응찰가를 비교한다.*/ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT MAX(BID_PRC) AS MAX_BID_PRC FROM TBL_DA_AUCTN_BID_H WHERE DEAL_SQ = #{dealSq} GROUP BY DEAL_SQ) A WHERE A.MAX_BID_PRC = ${bidPrc}
/*요청한 응찰가와 실시간 응찰가를 비교한다.*/ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT MAX(BID_PRC) AS MAX_BID_PRC FROM TBL_DA_AUCTN_BID_H WHERE DEAL_SQ = #{dealSq} GROUP BY DEAL_SQ) A WHERE A.MAX_BID_PRC >= ${bidPrc}
/*응찰 시간과 거래 종료시간을 체크한다*/ SELECT COUNT(DEAL_SQ) FROM TBL_DA_DEAL_M WHERE DEAL_SQ = #{dealSq} AND DEAL_ENDNG_DT <= NOW() + INTERVAL 1 SECOND

/*경매 종료 시간 지난 경매 정보 가져오기*/ SELECT A.DEAL_SQ AS dealSq, A.WORK_SQ AS workSq, B.WORK_NM AS workNm, A.SELL_MBR_SQ AS sellMbrSq, A.DEAL_TYP_CD AS dealTypCd, A.DEAL_AUCTN_PRC AS dealAuctnPrc, DATE_FORMAT(A.DEAL_STRT_DT, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') AS dealStrtDt, DATE_FORMAT(A.DEAL_ENDNG_DT, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') AS dealEndngDt FROM TBL_DA_DEAL_M A INNER JOIN TBL_DA_WORK_M B ON A.WORK_SQ = B.WORK_SQ WHERE A.DEAL_TYP_CD = 'A' AND A.DEAL_STTS_CD = 'TP' AND A.DEAL_ENDNG_DT <= NOW() + INTERVAL 5 SECOND AND B.DEL_YN = 'N' /*작품 삭제 여부 확인 */

/*판매 종료 시간 지났지만 판매 되지 않은 정찰가 거래 정보 가져오기*/ SELECT A.DEAL_SQ AS dealSq, A.WORK_SQ AS workSq, B.WORK_NM AS workNm, A.SELL_MBR_SQ AS sellMbrSq, A.BUY_MBR_SQ AS buyMbrSq, A.DEAL_TYP_CD AS dealTypCd, A.DEAL_AUCTN_PRC AS dealAuctnPrc, DATE_FORMAT(A.DEAL_STRT_DT, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') AS dealStrtDt, DATE_FORMAT(A.DEAL_ENDNG_DT, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') AS dealEndngDt FROM TBL_DA_DEAL_M A INNER JOIN TBL_DA_WORK_M B ON A.WORK_SQ = B.WORK_SQ WHERE A.DEAL_TYP_CD = 'S' AND A.DEAL_STTS_CD = 'TP' AND A.DEAL_ENDNG_DT <= NOW() + INTERVAL 5 SECOND AND B.DEL_YN = 'N' /*작품 삭제 여부 확인 */
/*경매 종료된 거래 낙찰자 가져오기*/ SELECT MBR_SQ AS buyMbrSq FROM TBL_DA_AUCTN_BID_H WHERE DEAL_SQ = #{dealSq} ORDER BY BID_PRC DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.update: /*유찰된 거래 거래 상태 유찰로 변경*/ UPDATE TBL_DA_DEAL_M SET DEAL_STTS_CD = 'FB' WHERE DEAL_SQ = #{dealSq}
mapper.select: /*작품 상세 정보 가져오기*/ SELECT A.WORK_SQ AS workSq, A.ARTST_SQ AS artstSq, C.DEAL_SQ AS dealSq, A.MBR_SQ AS mbrSq, IF(A.WORK_MAIN_IMG_URL IS NULL, A.WORK_IMG_FRT_URL, A.WORK_MAIN_IMG_URL) AS workMainImgUrl, /*작품대표이미지주소*/ A.ARTST_ACTVTY_NM AS artstActvtyNm, A.WORK_NM AS workNm, A.WORK_PRODC_YEAR AS workProdcYear, A.WORK_MATRL AS workMatrl, A.WORK_FRM_YN AS workFrmYn, A.WORK_SIZE_WIDTH AS workSizeWidth, A.WORK_SIZE_DEPTH AS workSizeDepth, A.WORK_SALE_YN AS workSaleYn, A.WORK_CLR_CD AS workClrCd, A.ARTST_ENGLS_NM AS artstEnglsNm, A.WORK_IMG_FRT_URL AS workImgFrtUrl, /*전면이미지주소*/ A.WORK_IMG_RER_URL AS workImgRerUrl, /*후면이미지주소*/ A.WORK_IMG_TOP_URL AS workImgTopUrl, /*상 이미지주소*/ A.WORK_IMG_BOT_URL AS workImgBotUrl, /*히 이미지주소*/ A.WORK_IMG_LEF_URL AS workImgLefUrl, /*좌 이미지주소*/ A.WORK_IMG_RIT_URL AS workImgRitUrl, /*우 이미지주소*/ A.WORK_LAKE AS workLake, FORMAT(A.WORK_PRC, 0) AS workPrc, B.MBR_NCKNM AS mbrNcknm, A.WORK_STATE AS workState, C.DEAL_TYP_CD AS dealTypCd, FORMAT(C.DEAL_STRT_PRC, 0) AS dealStrtPrc, FORMAT(C.DEAL_SBID_PRC, 0) AS dealSbidPrc, FORMAT(C.DEAL_FINAL_PRC, 0) AS dealFinalPrc, DATE_FORMAT(C.DEAL_STRT_DT, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') AS dealStrtDt, DATE_FORMAT(C.DEAL_ENDNG_DT, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') AS dealEndngDt, (SELECT MBR_NCKNM FROM TBL_DA_MBR_M WHERE MBR_SQ = C.BUY_MBR_SQ) AS buyNcknm FROM TBL_DA_WORK_M AS A INNER JOIN TBL_DA_MBR_M AS B ON A.MBR_SQ = B.MBR_SQ INNER JOIN TBL_DA_DEAL_M AS C ON A.WORK_SQ = C.WORK_SQ WHERE C.DEAL_SQ = #{dealSq} AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' /*작품 삭제 여부 확인 */

/*자동응찰 내용 조회*/ SELECT MBR_SQ AS mbrSq, DEAL_SQ AS dealSq, AUTO_BID_PRC AS autoBidPrc FROM TBL_DA_AUTO_BID_H WHERE DEAL_SQ = #{dealSq}
ORDER BY AUTO_BID_DT DESC, AUTO_BID_PRC DESC
/*자동응찰 중복 체크*/ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT MAX(AUTO_BID_PRC) AS MAX_AUTO_BID_PRC FROM TBL_DA_AUTO_BID_H WHERE DEAL_SQ = #{dealSq} GROUP BY DEAL_SQ) A WHERE A.MAX_AUTO_BID_PRC >= ${autoBidPrc}
mapper.insert: /*자동응찰 등록*/ INSERT INTO TBL_DA_AUTO_BID_H( MBR_SQ, DEAL_SQ, AUTO_BID_PRC, AUTO_BID_DT ) VALUES ( #{mbrSq}, #{dealSq}, ${autoBidPrc}, NOW() )
mapper.select: /* 거래내역 리스트 가져오기 (응찰히스토리)*/ SELECT A.BID_PRC AS bidPrc, DATE_FORMAT(A.BID_DATE, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') AS bidDate, B.MBR_NCKNM AS mbrNcknm, C.DEAL_STRT_PRC AS dealStrtPrc, DATE_FORMAT(C.DEAL_STRT_DT, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') AS dealStrtDate, (SELECT MBR_NCKNM FROM TBL_DA_MBR_M WHERE MBR_SQ = C.SELL_MBR_SQ) AS sellMbrNcknm FROM TBL_DA_AUCTN_BID_H AS A INNER JOIN TBL_DA_MBR_M AS B ON A.MBR_SQ = B.MBR_SQ INNER JOIN TBL_DA_DEAL_M AS C ON A.DEAL_SQ = C.DEAL_SQ WHERE A.DEAL_SQ = #{dealSq} GROUP BY A.MBR_SQ, A.BID_PRC

/* 거래 등록된 정보 가져오기 */ SELECT DEAL_SQ AS dealSq, SELL_MBR_SQ AS sellMbrSq, WORK_SQ AS workSq, DEAL_TYP_CD AS dealTypCd, DEAL_STTS_CD AS dealSttsCd, FORMAT(DEAL_STRT_PRC, 0) AS dealStrtPrc, DATE_FORMAT(DEAL_STRT_DT, '%Y.%m.%d') AS dealStrtDate, DATE_FORMAT(DEAL_ENDNG_DT, '%Y.%m.%d') AS dealEndngDate, DATE_FORMAT(DEAL_STRT_DT, '%H:%i') AS dealStrtTime, DATE_FORMAT(DEAL_ENDNG_DT, '%H:%i') AS dealEndngTime, DEAL_AUCTN_PRC AS dealAuctnPrc FROM TBL_DA_DEAL_M WHERE DEAL_SQ = #{dealSq}

/* 작품 정보 가져오기 */ SELECT A.WORK_SQ AS workSq, A.WORK_NM AS workNm, A.WORK_TYP_CD AS workTypCd, A.ARTST_SQ AS artstSq, A.ARTST_ACTVTY_NM AS artstActvtyNm, A.ARTST_BIRTH_YEAR AS artstBirthYear, A.WORK_LAKE AS workLake, A.WORK_SIZE_WIDTH AS workSizeWidth, A.WORK_SIZE_DEPTH AS workSizeDepth, A.WORK_MATRL AS workMatrl, A.WORK_PRODC_YEAR AS workProdcYear, A.WORK_MAIN_IMG_URL AS workMainImgUrl, /*작품대표이미지주소*/ A.WORK_IMG_FRT_URL AS workImgFrtUrl, A.WORK_IMG_RER_URL AS workImgRerUrl, A.WORK_FRM_YN AS workFrmYn, A.WORK_SALE_YN AS workSaleYn, A.WORK_CLR_CD AS workClrCd, A.WORK_GRT_URL AS workGrtUrl, FORMAT(A.WORK_PRC, 0) AS workPrc, A.WORK_IMG_LEF_URL AS workImgLefUrl, A.WORK_IMG_RIT_URL AS workImgRitUrl, A.WORK_IMG_TOP_URL AS workImgTopUrl, A.WORK_IMG_BOT_URL AS workImgBotUrl, A.WORK_VIDEO_URL AS workVideoUrl, A.WORK_INTRDC AS workIntrdc, (SELECT B.KEYWRD_SQ FROM TBL_DA_KEYWRD_S AS B WHERE A.WORK_SQ = B.WORK_SQ) AS keywrdSq, (SELECT B.KEYWRD FROM TBL_DA_KEYWRD_S AS B WHERE A.WORK_SQ = B.WORK_SQ) AS keywrd, WORK_OPEN_YN AS workOpenYn, A.WORK_STATE AS workState FROM TBL_DA_WORK_M AS A
WHERE A.WORK_SQ = #{workSq} AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' /*작품 삭제 여부 확인 */
/* 응찰 또는 판매됬는지 확인 */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT DEAL_SQ AS dealSq FROM TBL_DA_DEAL_M WHERE DEAL_SQ = #{dealSq} AND (DEAL_STTS_CD != 'TP' OR DEAL_AUCTN_PRC IS NOT NULL) ) A

/*판매 중단 실패한 작품 리스트*/ SELECT B.DEAL_SQ AS dealSq, A.WORK_SQ AS workSq, IF(A.WORK_PRODC_YEAR IS NULL OR A.WORK_PRODC_YEAR = '', A.WORK_NM, CONCAT(A.WORK_NM, ' (', A.WORK_PRODC_YEAR, ')')) AS workNm, A.ARTST_ACTVTY_NM AS artstActvtyNm, IF(A.ARTST_YOD IS NULL OR A.ARTST_YOD = '', A.ARTST_BIRTH_YEAR, CONCAT(A.ARTST_BIRTH_YEAR, '~' ,A.ARTST_YOD)) AS artstBirthYear FROM TBL_DA_WORK_M A INNER JOIN TBL_DA_DEAL_M B ON A.WORK_SQ = B.WORK_SQ AND B.DEAL_STTS_CD != 'FB' WHERE B.DEAL_SQ = #{dealSq}

/* 거래 종료된 경매 유찰자 조회*/ SELECT A.MBR_SQ AS mbrSq, A.BID_DATE AS bidDate FROM ( SELECT * FROM TBL_DA_AUCTN_BID_H WHERE DEAL_SQ = #{bidDealSq} AND (BID_DATE) IN ( SELECT MAX(BID_DATE) AS bidDate FROM TBL_DA_AUCTN_BID_H GROUP BY MBR_SQ ) ORDER BY BID_DATE ) A WHERE A.MBR_SQ != #{bidBuyMbrSq} GROUP BY A.MBR_SQ
mapper.update: /*구매확정 거래 상태 작품 판매 여부 사용 여부 수정*/ UPDATE TBL_DA_WORK_M AS A INNER JOIN TBL_DA_DEAL_M AS B ON A.WORK_SQ = B.WORK_SQ INNER JOIN TBL_DA_WORK_DEAL_H AS C ON B.DEAL_SQ = C.DEAL_SQ SET A.USE_YN = 'N', A.WORK_SALE_YN = 'Y', A.UPDT_DT = NOW(), A.UPDT_MBR_SQ = #{sellMbrSq}, B.DEAL_STTS_CD = 'PC', C.DEAL_FINAL_PRC = #{dealFinalPrc}, C.DEAL_SELL_FEE = #{dealSellFee}, C.DEAL_CALC_PRC = #{dealCalcPrc} WHERE B.DEAL_SQ = #{dealSq} AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' /*작품 삭제 여부 확인 */
